title: Shadow Resurrection (Part 2)
body:
Shadow Resurrection (Part 2)

Evan looked for the core in the body of the hippopotamus but did not find anything.

After not finding the core he used his shadow resurrection skill on it.

Shadow energy came out from his monarch core, and covered the body of the hippopotamus.

After covering its body the energy seeped inside it.

Evan noticed this time less shadow energy was consumed when he used shadow resurrection.

'Maybe because it is a B+ rank while Layal was an A rank' Evan thought when he saw this time less shadow energy was consumed.

But soon Evan saw the body of the hippopotamus was tearing apart and blood started to come out from all over its body.

He raised an eyebrow and stepped away from it.

After a few seconds, the shadow energy which seeped inside the body of the hippopotamus completely disappeared, and a notification appeared before him.

(Shadow resurrection failed)
